knimeNode.name: Case converter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts document terms to lower or upper case.

fullDescription.intro: Converts all terms contained in the input documents to lower or upper case.

tab.name: Converter options
tab.option: The case to convert to (lower or upper case).

tab.name: Preprocessing options
tab.option: The column containing the documents to preprocess.
If checked, the documents will be replaced by the new preprocessed documents. Otherwise the preprocessed documents will be appended as new column.
The name of the new appended column, containing the preprocessed documents.
If checked, unmodifiable terms will be preprocessed too.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents to preprocess.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed documents.
